subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mats Sundin set two Toronto records on one play on Thursday and the host Maple Leafs rebounded from an embarrassing loss with an 8-1 victory against the Islanders.
snippet: Mats Sundin set two Toronto records on one play on Thursday and the host Maple Leafs rebounded from an embarrassing loss with an 8-1 victory against the Islanders.
